radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits; contour of the liver is smooth; no focal liver mass; main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 3 mm; cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening; pancreas appears within normal limits without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation; normal spleen measuring 10.2 cm; limited images of right kidney show no evidence of hydronephrosis; visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
